## Source: ossf-package-analysis (56e9fb2a7d91d090c5daebf11bf839a8c406149a5eb97098ced6820c0285e4ea)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'testcafe-reporter-ayx-reportportal' @ 3.9.11 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
